s1.title: SVG Tools and Applications
s1.p: The Batik distribution contains several pre-packaged demos:

ul.li: SVG Browser. The SVG Browser lets you view SVG file, zoom, pan and rotate in the content and select text items in the image.
SVG Rasterizer. >TheSVG Rasterizer converts SVG files into JPEG or PNG images.

SVG Pretty Printer. The SVG Pretty Printer lets developers pretty-up their SVG files and get their tabulations and other cosmetic parameters in order. It can also be used to modify the DOCTYPE declaration on SVG files.

SVG Font Converter. The SVG Font Converter lets developers convert character ranges from the True Type Font format to the SVG Font format to embed in SVG documents. This allows SVG document to be fully self-contained be rendered exactly the same on all systems
